The British School of Tashkent Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Dear Parents and visitors of our wonderful school,
We are holding a charity fare from 10:00 to 13:00 on December 13th to help a seriously ill child and/or the orphanage children.
Here is the program of the fair:
- An exhibition of the schoolchildren’s works of art; each class will present their work,
- Small children's concert
- Buffet
- Dance program
The purpose of the event: funds from this event will be used to provide child support suffering from serious diseases and orphanage.
Для русского текста пройдите по ссылке:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1vh1ZLyEr76NVdBR1lJb0M2Nmc/view
Dear parents, we thank you for your continued help in the organization of all events in our school and enthusiasm to take part in the life of our school.
In this regard, would like to recommend you some options to participate in this fair:
1. You can purchase one place (1 table), and use the stall to sell confectionery or other products. The money for the sale of products will be yours. Cost of 1 table - 300 000 sum. Terms of participation: the payment is made in the accounting department of the school in cash (no later than 8 December 2014), the table should be decorated in the style of your products or places that you are promoting.
After payment, you will receive a receipt for permission to the company to participate in the fair, through which you will be allowed to enter the school on the day of the fair.
2. You can invite your friends to participate in the charity fair by buying a place for the sale and advertising of their products.
3. You can sponsor and invite a company that will decorate the school for the fair (balls, flowers and so on).
All tables will be sold before December 8, 2014. Participants may bring and decorate their tables December 13, 2014 from 8:00 to 9:30 and export the remaining product from 13:00 to 14:00. Import and export of products according to receipt of approval of the Company to participate in the fair. The list of participants will be approved by the Director and a copy will be given to the security guard of the school.
If you do wish to participate then please contact as soon as possible places are limited!
The contact persons are:
Mrs. Elena Khodjayeva – (90) 9850660
Ms. Elena Savtsova - 2685562
